item.title: Spring Web/MVC
item.description: Spring Web Servlet Lifecycle A Servlet lifecycle is managed by the container in which it has been deployed. https://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/tutorial/doc/bnafi.html http://docs.jboss.org/jbossas/javadoc/7.1.2.Final/javax/servlet/Servlet.html ContextLoaderListener This is the bootstrap listener to manipulate the Spring’s root WebApplicationContext (being shared by all servlets within the web application).
